content: पृथक् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Severally, separately, singly; शंखान् दध्मुः पृथक् पृथक् <ls>Bg. 1. 18</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 26</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 57.</ls> {@--2@} Different, separate, distinct; <ls>Bg. 5. 4</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">13. 4</ls>; रचिता पृथगर्थता गिरां <ls>Ki. 2. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Apart, aside. alone; <ls>V. 4. 20.</ls> {@--4@} Apart from, except, with the exception of, without; (with <ab>acc.</ab>, <ab>instr.</ab>, or <ab>abl.</ab>); पृथग्रामेण-रामात्-रामं वा <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 109.</ls> (पृथक् कृ {@--1@} to separate, divide, sever, analyse. {@--2@} to keep off, avert.).
